public boolean tableExists(java.lang.String tablename)
Method tableExists

tableEmpty

public boolean tableEmpty(java.lang.String tablename)
Method tableEmpty. Checks if a table is empty. Use tableExists to check if the table exists before checking if it is empty if you are not sure.

Parameters:
tablename - The name of the table to check.
Returns:
True if the table exists and is empty, false if it is not empty or it doesn't exist or any error ocurred.

rowExists

public boolean rowExists(java.lang.String sqlstatement)
Method rowExists. Checks if the statement returns a row.

Parameters:
sqlstatement - Statement to be executed on the db.
Returns:
True if the statement has a row as a result, else false if there is no row as a result or any error ocurred.

stringQuery

public java.lang.String stringQuery(java.lang.String sqlstatement)
Method stringQuery. Method for queries where there is only one column in one row returned (or of interest).

Parameters:
sqlstatement - The statement to execute.
Returns:
The first column of the first row of the result is returned, if there are no rows that match the query 'null' is returned.

resultSetQuery

public java.sql.ResultSet resultSetQuery(java.lang.String sqlstatement)
Method resultSetQuery. Method for queries where the whole result set is of interest.

Parameters:
sqlstatement - The statement to execute.
Returns:
The result, if there are no rows that match the query 'null' is returned.

execute

public boolean execute(java.lang.String sqlstatement)
Method execute. Method for data manipulation inside the db where no result is expected.

Returns:
false on error, true on succesful completion

prepareStatement

public java.sql.PreparedStatement prepareStatement(java.lang.String sqlstatement)
Method prepareStatement. Prepares a preparedStatement. You have to call this before calling executePreparedStatement.

Parameters:
sqlstatement - The prepared statement as a String.
Returns:
The preparedStatement as an Object.

executePreparedStatement

public boolean executePreparedStatement(java.sql.PreparedStatement statement,
                                        int... params)
Method executePreparedStatement. Executes a preparedStatement with the parameters.

Parameters:
statement - PreparedStatement to be executed.
params - The parameters to be inserted at the i-th places in the prepared statement. There must be exactly the same number of parameters as the prepared statements needs (the number of ?).
Returns:
True if executed successful. False in event of error.

tableReset

public boolean tableReset(java.lang.String tablename)
Method tableReset. If the table doesn't exist it is created. If the table does exist all entries are deleted. Delete cascade.

Parameters:
tablename - Table to be reset.
Returns:
True if executed successful. False in event of error.

createTable

public boolean createTable(java.lang.String tablename)
Method tableReset. If the table doesn't exist it is created. If the table does exist, it cannot be created and 'false' is returned.

Parameters:
tablename - Table to be created.
Returns:
True if executed successful. False in event of error.

Parameters:
